manipulated_prompt_obj.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Cologne
TO: Dresden
BY: Boat
CLASS: Business
WHEN: On April 10

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Do you think the travel agent knows where you depart from? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

message.reasoning: Alright, the user is asking if the travel agent knows where they're departing from. Let me check the initial setup. The user provided details including departure from Cologne, but specified that the travel agent doesn't know about the trip yet. The question is a yes/no, so the answer should be "no" because the agent hasn't been informed. Need to make sure the response is just "ANSWER: No" without any extra info. Got it.
